definitions.definition: occurring, appearing, or done infrequently and irregularly.
examples: the occasional car went by but no taxis
synonyms: sometime "the admiral made occasional appearances on board our ship"

definitions.definition: (of furniture) made or adapted for use on a particular occasion or for irregular use.
(of a literary composition, speech, religious service, etc.) produced on or intended for a special occasion.
examples: he wrote occasional verse for patrons

definitions.definition: employed for a particular occasion or on an irregular basis.
